item.title: #pt @ 1502390465185947648
item.description:
Hoje @lorenaps__ defendeu o mestrado. Eu tive o prazer de orienta-la durante esse processo. Lorena caracterizou a comunidade que utiliza dados abertos sobre educação. Cola aqui depois o link da visualização, Lorena :)
Parabéns!

item.title: #en @ 1502385042663817236
item.description: @ckoettl @sentinel_hub @Maxar 🟠 Here a slightly enhanced image of the area in #Moshchun, #Kyiw, #Ukraine🇺🇦, better showing structures. IR heat signatures in yellow-red. Full-size ➡️ https://t.co/zPkVNWOwPl #RemoteSensing #OpenData #OSINT #Ukraine https://t.co/5QQ8jI0diV

item.title: #es @ 1502372206931853327
item.description: Estoy investigando en temas de seguridad y @agaviriau hace un buen diagnóstico de lo que necesita el país. Añadiría un tema de integración de sistemas de información y datos abiertos, pero la tiene clara. Desde la distancia hoy ya votamos. Éxitos! https://t.co/xJOQNxn7bX

item.title: #es @ 1502364991143522313
item.description: ¿Sabían de la Guía de Reconstrucción de Puerto Rico? El tomo sobre infraestructura física hace referencia a la necesidad de un plan de transporte sostenible y la integración de datos abiertos a la toma de decisiones sobre la planificación y operación de nuestro sistema vial. https://t.co/YGbag1eNAs

item.title: #en @ 1502320761175883776
item.description: One issue that is close to my heart and I hope to hear about more from City Council candidates is tech improvements: better apps for City services, more open data, getting more productive with our enormous IT budgets (ESRI, SQLServer, Office, etc.). A lot of work! Yet... 1/n

item.title: #pt @ 1502320478668886016
item.description: Um catálogo de dados abertos open source, ou seja, de código aberto e uso livre, adotado por dezenas de governos e empresas pelo mundo (incluindo o @govbr) e desenvolvido pela @OKFN. A @okfnbr também ajuda a disseminar e implementar por aqui 👇🏽 https://t.co/4jkQze4KT9

item.title: #en @ 1502310598943641600
item.description:
Very cool new way to combine @covSpectrum and Nextclade! 😁
This is only possible due to truly #opendata that can be shared between platforms! (In this case provided via @nextstrain from Genbank.) This allows incredibly inventive tools & totally novel ways to explore data! https://t.co/WK3I1YyvhP

item.title: #en @ 1502308851642736642
item.description: ‼️New #opendata in #eodash: daily SO2 ‼️ Explore how #TROPOMI data from @CopernicusEU #Sentinel5p 🛰️ can help tracking Sulphur Dioxide in the atmosphere 👉https://t.co/qW0E671TCb 👉https://t.co/wzXGuL4uzY Here's an example of before & after the #CumbreVieja eruption👇#openscience https://t.co/kEZMEf8sFI

item.title: #en @ 1502308848031391745
item.description:

item.title: #en @ 1502306767371476992
item.description: The first open data release is also online: https://t.co/UvYeqxvQ7F and we are already working on v2 with even more observations being made available.

item.title: #en @ 1502303072986574849
item.description: You know how @cityofhamilton is claiming it released a record number of open data sets last year? Some of these "open data sets" are actually PDF files. I kid you not. PDFs are not machine readable, they are not open data. [They can be useful, but again, not open data] https://t.co/bsYZ4I4DzF

item.title: #en @ 1502299962847211523
item.description: 🇬🇧🇺🇸 . Today @Le_Parisien is publishing a paper featuring a map presenting the daily status of the war in #Ukraine. Here is a short thread on why we @leparisiendata used Wikipedia as one of our sources and why we publish the transformed and edited data on Github. #opendata https://t.co/nSO5ZcNTSv

item.title: #en @ 1502298302682832896
item.description: Help #OpenScience peeps! I'm presenting at @theNASEM on Open Sci. Tell me how doing #OpenScience (using #OpenData, #OSS tools, or #openaccess pubs) has helped your science. Or how someone #sharingknowledge has helped your science. Pictures are a bonus! Thanks! Please RT.

item.title: #en @ 1502290439738638349
item.description: What percentage of land would you guess is zoned for Multifamily homes in Wake County? Here are some quick charts I made as I dig into the overall parcel data for the county. Such a cool data set! https://t.co/VrhbVDcV35 https://t.co/8mHiXjPGUd

item.description:

Join @ITDP_HQ on Tuesday 3/22 for a webinar on how open data helps this process! Register here 👇👇 #YearoftheBicycle
https://t.co/QLVwvR0hDU https://t.co/XdrDEMswbt

item.title: #en @ 1502265822143725570
item.description:
Mismatch Finder now also contains potential mismatches between Wikidata and @MusicBrainz. You can help review them to make both projects better and the Linked Open Data Web stronger.
Learn more about Mismatch Finder here: https://t.co/mKDMMKOpHG

item.description: T'es en séminaire @datactivi_st peinard, et paf tu te retrouves à chercher des gif de tigres à dents de sabre. L'open data mène vraiment à tout...

item.title: #fr @ 1502229599429795842
item.description: BREAKING: Voici le nouveau bot "Russian Tanker Tracker" @RUTankerTracker qui suit les supertankers transportant du pétrole et du gaz venant des ports russes. Ce bot utilise les données publiques AIS/satellite de MarineTraffic. Les fossiles doivent cesser de financer cette guerre!

item.title: #en @ 1502217009236529158

#OpenData #Philanthropy #Champion
🧵1/6

item.description: OK, I have now used my StatsNZ Open Data API key in practice, rather than just having applied for it incase I had a use for it one day. That day was this day.

item.description: The 4th challenge of the #EUDatathon 2022 is an open challenge! item.title: #en @ 1502146046075367424
item.description: One of the cool things about New York City is it's open data program. Hundreds of data sets are available on https://t.co/pzk52dL9lC that anyone can access and easily view/access/export. The database has everything from 311 service requests to Motor Vehicle Accidents (1/)

item.title: #es @ 1502087126871068709
item.description: Los #DatosAbiertos ayudan a transparentar la información y generar Estados eficientes. En 🇪🇨 avanzamos a pasos agigantados al tener 463 conjuntos de datos publicados en el portal https://t.co/K1cx3G1wsR. 20 de estos han sido identificados como clave para prevenir la corrupción.

item.title: #es @ 1502087124652281857
item.description: Con la @OEA_oficial y @Almagro_OEA2015 reafirmamos el compromiso ecuatoriano de luchar contra la corrupción al presentar hoy la Guía de Implementación del Programa Interamericano de #DatosAbiertos para Prevenir y Combatir la Corrupción (#PIDA). https://t.co/4JHztr1f5Z

item.title: #en @ 1502086605795778568
item.description: About to start our first #PollutionIsCollonialism book club today. Will be adding ideas from the conversation to this thread.

item.title: #es @ 1502080119791403010
item.description:
A casi 2 años del inicio de la contingencia #COVID19 en #Sonora, hoy se confirmó el deceso 10 mil por la enfermedad.
Además, en los registros de los datos abiertos de @SSalud_mx se encuentran 196 sonorenses fallecidas con sospecha de #COVID
#SonoraenDatos https://t.co/OUm3OwF0v2

item.title: #en @ 1501976863689822217
item.description:
Open Data Protocol envisions an open social media ecosystem where developers have more opportunities to build and innovate, and users have more choice and control over which services they use and their experience on social media.
$OPEN #OPENDATAPROTOCOL
